Title: Authorizes Ministerio Sion New York, Inc. to retroactively apply for a real property tax exemption for certain property
Summary: Authorizes Ministerio Sion New York, Inc. to retroactively apply for a real property tax exemption for the 2022-2023 school year and 2023 general taxes for certain property located at 97 New Hyde Park Road in the hamlet of Franklin Square, town of Hempstead, county of Nassau.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the Ministerio Sion New York, Inc. to retroactively apply for a real property tax exemption for certain property
